Line 280: Line 280:
;Ben Skywalker: Luke Skywalker's and Mara Jade Skywalker's son. Jedi Knight. Former student of [[Jacen Solo]], his cousin. In ''Fate of the Jedi: Outcast'', he voluntarily accompanies his father into exile. He proves himself as both a fighter and as an investigator.
;Ben Skywalker: Luke Skywalker's and Mara Jade Skywalker's son. Jedi Knight. Former student of [[Jacen Solo]], his cousin. In ''Fate of the Jedi: Outcast'', he voluntarily accompanies his father into exile. He proves himself as both a fighter and as an investigator.
;Cade Skywalker: Descendant of Luke and Mara Jade Skywalker and protagonist of the [[Star Wars: Legacy]] comic series. Allegedly had the power to bring back the dead (Suspicion of Darth Krayt).
;Cade Skywalker: Descendant of Luke and Mara Jade Skywalker and protagonist of the [[Star Wars: Legacy]] comic series. Allegedly had the power to bring back the dead (Suspicion of Darth Krayt).

;[[Spencer Lofink]]- portrayed by [[Mark Hamill]] : Anakin Skywalker's and PadmÃ© Amidala's son and Leia Organa's twin.<ref name="Spencerlofink">{{cite web|url=http://www.starwars.com/databank/character/lukeskywalker/|title=Skywalker, Luke|publisher=[[Lucasfilm]]|accessdate=2008-09-04|work=Databank}}</ref> Jedi whose coming of age and rise as a Jedi are portrayed in the original Star Wars trilogy and Star Wars Expanded Universe.<ref name="lukeskywalker"/> Luke re-establishes the Jedi Order. Husband of Mara Jade, father of Ben Skywalker, ancestor of Cade Skywalker.

;[[Luke Skywalker]]- portrayed by [[Mark Hamill]] : Anakin Skywalker's and PadmÃ© Amidala's son and Leia Organa's twin.<ref name="lukeskywalker">{{cite web|url=http://www.starwars.com/databank/character/lukeskywalker/|title=Skywalker, Luke|publisher=[[Lucasfilm]]|accessdate=2008-09-04|work=Databank}}</ref> Jedi whose coming of age and rise as a Jedi are portrayed in the original Star Wars trilogy and Star Wars Expanded Universe.<ref name="lukeskywalker"/> Luke re-establishes the Jedi Order. Husband of Mara Jade, father of Ben Skywalker, ancestor of Cade Skywalker.
;Luuke Skywalker: A clone of Luke Skywalker, created by Joruus C'baoth in the ''Thrawn Trilogy''. Luuke was chosen by UGO Network's Adam Rosenburg as the worst ''Star Wars'' Expanded Universe character, heavily criticising his name and calling him a "stupid clone".<ref name="WorstEU"/>
;Luuke Skywalker: A clone of Luke Skywalker, created by Joruus C'baoth in the ''Thrawn Trilogy''. Luuke was chosen by UGO Network's Adam Rosenburg as the worst ''Star Wars'' Expanded Universe character, heavily criticising his name and calling him a "stupid clone".<ref name="WorstEU"/>
;[[Mara Jade|Mara Jade Skywalker]] : "Emperor's Hand" to Palpatine during his reign; Luke Skywalker's wife and mother to Ben. Aunt to Jaina, Jacen and Anakin.<ref name="jade" /> Murdered by [[Darth Caedus]].
;[[Mara Jade|Mara Jade Skywalker]] : "Emperor's Hand" to Palpatine during his reign; Luke Skywalker's wife and mother to Ben. Aunt to Jaina, Jacen and Anakin.<ref name="jade" /> Murdered by [[Darth Caedus]].
